member.name: T:Pulumi.Command.Provider
member.summary: The provider type for the command package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the [documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.
